Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and into the terminal, due to a festival near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Buses will operate in both directions via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and then into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

 

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to Fiesta Boricua.

Headline: No trains between Forest Park and Austin
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Forest Park and Austin due to a police investigation.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service is still temporarily suspended between Forest Park and Austin due to a police investigation.

As a result, trains are operating only between O'Hare and Austin at this time.

  • Shuttle buses are available between Forest Park and Austin to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #7 Harrison 
  • #49 Western
  • #50 Damen 
  • #91 Austin

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
